Mayflower Home Organizing »

Mayflower Home Organizing is a home organizing company offering full-service luxury organization, design, and space planning.

Mayflower Home Organizing is an organizing company that offers full-service luxury organization, design and space planning. We create customized organization solutions for your spaces and we show you the best ways to maintain these systems. It enabled me to combine my business skills with my desire to help and care for others. At the end of the day, it is very rewarding to see how home organization changes peoples lives. Company Overview

American School of Finance is an online school created to teach financial literacy to kids from Grades 6-12 so that they graduate high school with a solid set of financial skills. We are not making day traders or grooming the next generation of Wall Street pros. We are here to teach them the basics of budgeting, how to manage credit and the value of investing in their future. We are here to teach financial literacy so that our students will be better off in the future. Our aim is to make our students self-sufficient.

Babson did of course. My professor said if you want to create a business, then go find a problem and figure out a solution. When I heard about the overall general lack of financial literacy in this country, I realized I had to solve the problem.

The inspiration for creating this brand arose from a personal need. Having faced challenges with thyroid and fertility issues, I struggled to find products that catered to my specific needs. In response to this gap in the market, I embarked on a journey to create a brand rooted in my Southern family traditions that have stood the test of time. Drawing on these timeless traditions and incorporating herbal ingredients, I formulated products designed to deliver tangible results for our customers.

Cracked Gaming »

Spencer Wilson '24

Free to play cash prize based gaming tournaments. Paid for through targeted advertising.

Spencer Wilson '24

Co-Founder & CMO

Company Overview

At Cracked Gaming, we enable gamers to earn risk free prizes playing the games they love, bridging them with brands seeking targeted engagement. This approach not only disincentivizes traditional performance based gambling, but also provides brands access to hyper-specific niches and never before seen engagement rates. How Cracked Gaming Works: Players register on our platform and connect their gaming accounts (already partnered with Epic Games). Cracked collects players’ game rankings to match them to a division possessing similarly skilled opponents. The player then partakes in a 15 day season attempting to earn as many points as possible in the allotted time. At the end of the season, the top 5 highest performing players in the division receive a cash payout. Before submitting their scores each game, players engage with one of our unique advertising mechanisms, ensuring never seen before levels of user engagement. This cycle repeats, promoting continuous participation and consistent advertiser engagement.

Company Inspiration

A love for gaming and a dislike for the extractive nature of current video game performance based betting platforms.

Sync AI Inc. »

Tushar Sinha MBA'23

Remote Health Monitoring and Management Platform

Tushar Sinha MBA'23

Chief Executive Officer

Company Overview

Sync connects to all your existing devices, sensors, and apps for real-time health & wellness data pipeline and will provide member with AI Care Plans and Regular Hyper Personalized Recommendations. Sync uses AI Chatbot to flag the earliest detection of any chronic conditions (Specifically: Prediabetes, PCOS, Thyroid, Cardiovascular Health, etc.) or manage any existing conditions related to Physical, Mental & Spiritual Health. For baseline information we send an at home/school test kit to members and gain insights about 19 - 25 biomarkers from their body. All without insurance, cpt code or provider. We measure adherence rate, mood meter, behavioral intentions of a member, collect risk adjustment metrics for the member and insurances. Member can also download our COMPREHENSIVE REPORT for future provider visit. Giving provider access to unique data for better analysis of the member - currently Carbon Health accepts our report as a baseline test. In the future we will have our own nurse practitioners and be a quick primary care center for the member.

Company Inspiration

"I refuse to live as a mere patient of chronic diseases; instead, I envision myself as the protagonist of a prevention story, driven not only by a commitment to wellness but also empowered by entrepreneurship." Imagine being diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes during your first year of undergrad, with no one to guide you through the journey ahead. I've been there, feeling the weight of managing my health alone, navigating the highs and lows of HbA1C levels for nine years. But I have learned there's no one-size-fits-all solution for diabetes management. It's a personal journey, often filled with uncertainty and frustration. Yet, it doesn't have to be this way. Diabetes shouldn't be a taboo topic. It affects millions of Americans, yet many shy away from discussing it. It's time to change that narrative. That's why I've dedicated myself to spreading awareness and offering support to those at risk of developing diabetes and other chronic conditions and disorders.

New York, NY

Founded in 2023

Skona Pet Food »

Srihas Sampath MBA'20

Simple, healthy, and natural pet food products using premium quality ingredients and innovative cooking methods

Srihas Sampath MBA'20

Co-Founder

Company Overview

Our products are crafted carefully with premium ingredients and packaged in recyclable pouches. We sell single ingredient dehydrated treats, our current products are beef heart, beef liver, chicken jerky and pork heart treats. Our products are available on our website and on Amazon.

Company Inspiration

In 2016, our journey began when Skipper entered our lives. Our search for wholesome pet nourishment revealed a market saturated with pet food brands all offering the same variety of food with ingredients of artificial additives and chemicals. The food led to health woes for Skipper. Determined to provide better, we started crafting nutritious homemade meals for him, armed with insights from vets, pet nutritionists, and diligent research. This initiative blossomed into a range of recipes and treats that have significantly enhanced Skipper's health over time. We started to observe higher energy levels, better digestion, and healthy skin and coat. Soon, Kona entered our lives, and both our pups enjoy daily homemade meals and treats. Yes, our dogs are the inspiration behind our name: Skipper + Kona = Skona! The word Skona is also a Swedish verb that translates to ‘protect’. We strongly believe it is our duty as pet parents to protect and save our pets from harm by providing the best nutrition. At Skona Pet Food, we aspire to share our nutritious recipes and knowledge with all pet owners who seek nothing but the best for their furry companions. We have been selling our treats across local farmers’ markets on the East Coast and on our website for the past few years. We are grateful for the wonderful feedback and all the love and support we have received from the pet community. Our goal is to produce simple, healthy, and natural pet food products using premium quality ingredients and innovative cooking methods. We as people have made the shift towards healthy diets and conscious nutrition, it’s about time we did the same for our pets!

Company Overview

Mega3 Firm was originally established with the mission of serving the Caribbean and West Indian communities. Over time, our vision has evolved, and we are now dedicated to extending our support to a broader range of minority communities. At Mega3 Firm, we offer invaluable advice and strategic support across a spectrum of specialties. We take pride in sharing our expertise in technology, business and career consulting with individuals, as well as small and medium-sized business owners in the West Indian, Caribbean, and diverse immigrant communities. Company Inspiration

Upon our founder's arrival to America from Jamaica, Thalia first settled in South Florida before moving to New England. South Florida has always had a spot in her heart as it shares many similarities to her homeland, being heavily Caribbean influenced. During a heartfelt conversation with a mentor about facing harassment, racism and retaliation from a previous employer, it was suggested that she leverage her experience to advise businesses in Florida. She didn't understand the magnitude of clients that would benefit greatly from her expertise prior to even establishing her LLC. Thalia would be approached often in public while being a consumer at small business fairs and out at local restaurants by people asking for business advice. Her natural entrepreneurial ways, which she credits to her parents and an academic background in social and cultural studies, were itching to be intermixed. This fusion has given birth to what is now known as Mega3 Firm, where we genuinely embody the motto, "Providing personal and patient expertise from people like you."

Cape Clasp »

Patrick Clarke '09

A purpose-driven brand on a mission to make waves for marine life causes

Patrick Clarke '09

Founder

Company Overview

Founded in 2015 on the shores of Cape Cod, Cape Clasp began as a humble project after Babson. Initially, we were hiding bracelets shaped like Cape Cod in geocaches, sharing the locations on social media and encouraging people to explore our favorite places. We started receiving inquiries to buy the bracelets, which nudged us to create a website and build a non-profit partnership model with the CC National Seashore. Since then, we've evolved into a purpose-driven brand with the mission to #makewaves for marine life causes. Over the years, our offering has expanded to include three distinct lines: Cape Clasp, Tikós, and the Tides Program. Tikós, launched in 2016, features 100% recycled ocean plastic bracelets and sunglasses, offering a daily reminder to be mindful of your plastic use. This line has led to collaborations with organizations like the National Park Foundation and Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution. In 2020, we introduced the Tides Program, offering limited edition apparel that captures the spirit of the ocean in everything from hand tie-dyed tees to pop-culture-inspired collections. 15% of our profits flow directly to our growing list of marine life non-profit partners, summing up to over $200,000 in donations. You've been instrumental in this success—your shared passion keeps us anchored to our mission and inspires every new collection, collaboration, and charitable contribution we make.

Company Inspiration

What inspired me to create Cape Clasp was a profound love for Cape Cod's unique natural beauty and a desire to see it preserved for future generations. After attending Babson, I returned to the Cape and began hiding bracelets shaped like Cape Cod in geocaches. The idea was simple: encourage people to explore, appreciate, and ultimately protect this special place. The overwhelming response to those bracelets showed me there was an opportunity to create a venture that combined entrepreneurship with purpose. Company Overview

Fihri is a social enterprise with the mission to end period poverty sustainably. We do this in 3 ways: Period Palooza is an engaging initiative that brings together student groups, businesses, and organizations to raise funds directly on our website, contributing $10 for each kit made. This exciting team bonding experience focuses on creating sustainable period kits comprising reusable pouches, eco-friendly pads, tampons, and panty liners. We have successfully assembled 800 kits, benefitting schools in Massachusetts as well as earthquake survivors in Turkey and Syria, and communities in Kenya and Nigeria. Fihri's Student Sponsorship Program presents an opportunity for individuals to make a meaningful impact by personally supporting a student in need with a monthly $15 sponsorship. We recognize and respect that menstruation is a unique experience for each individual, which is why we offer a range of choices. Once a sponsor submits their $15, we collaborate with dedicated school nurses in areas with the greatest need to identify a deserving student. Based on the student's preferences, we carefully assemble and mail sustainable period products tailored to their specific needs. To uplift their spirits, we also include PMS candy and an inspiring note, reminding them that they are not alone. In Fihri's One for One Program, we believe in the power of giving back. For every product purchased by an individual, we commit to donating a pad and tampon to a menstruator in need.

Company Inspiration

When my daughter began her menstrual journey, I wanted her to have sustainable access to period products. However, I soon realized that there were girls her age right here in Massachusetts who were struggling to afford these necessities. Shockingly, I discovered that 8th graders were teaching 6th graders how to use toilet paper as makeshift period pads. Motivated by this injustice, I developed the concept during my International Business class and subsequently applied to the WinLab. After being accepted, I successfully launched Fihri to ensure that my daughter and her peers had sustainable access to period products.

Company Overview

At DetraPel we know that life can get messy, and we want to help. That is why we manufacture and distribute powerful, planet-friendly, cancer-free protective coatings designed for use on all your favorite fabric and leather belongings. Using innovative nanotechnology, DetraPel liquid repellent sprays create completely harmless, invisible barriers that protect your items from damage caused by water, other liquids and even food! You could say we’re in the business of protection, which is why we stand by our slogan ""Protect What You Love"". This phrase to us means so much more than protecting the stuff you own. Unlike many of our competitors, we deliver climate conscious products, that contain no cancer-causing fluorochemicals (like PFAS) and deliver state-of-the-art packaging that contains zero harmful propellants. This way you can protect the things you love, while protecting the people, pets and planet you love too! The greatest part is that everyone can use DetraPel on just about anything. The benefits and surfaces are endless based on the technology. Whether you want to protect your white carpet from wine stains, your brand new shoes from getting dirty outside, or your car seats from accidental coffee spills, DetraPel has got you covered.

Company Inspiration

Growing up in Philadelphia with divorced immigrant parents taught me a lot of what I needed to know to get to where I am today. I grew up watching my mother hustling daily to provide me with the best possible life. I learned very early on that success meant hard work and sacrifice. So at an early age I started dabbling in different business ideas in an effort to contribute, which included selling popular headphones and watches. In high school I started a shoe cleaning business. This business ran for 4 months and we generated significant revenue. I was ecstatic. After just 4 months I was given an offer to sell. The decision was easy. I sold my first business and invested all of the money into starting DetraPel. The idea for DetraPel started from the conditioning service we were offering with my shoe cleaning business. I was using a competitor’s product, which I later found out was extremely carcinogenic, caused birth defects, dried white and ruined fabric. On top of that it was extremely expensive. By having used the toxic formulas, I exposed myself to harmful chemicals, but more importantly an industry-changing idea. I knew I wanted to create protective formulas that were safe enough to apply at home, without a mask, and in the presence of babies and puppies.
